sentences.english: He restored the traditional chanting and created more opportunities for monastics to propagate the Dharma by means of chanting.
sentences.chinese: 不但恢复传统梵呗也同时培养了更多梵呗高僧来传播。

sentences.english: The news photograph can not only acquire information, and can also get beautiful enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 新闻照片不但可以获得信息，而且还能得到美的享受。

sentences.english: Lush and mouth-filling from start to finish, there is enough acid to support the whole structure while retaining an excellent balance.
sentences.chinese: 适当的酸度不但支持了整体结构亦展现了绝佳的平衡。

sentences.english: Nuwa not only to the day of salvation, but also in creation, work miracles.
sentences.chinese: 女娲不但补天救世，还创造万物，神通广大。

sentences.english: She not only can be embosomed but also can be kissed seethingly as much as you like.
sentences.chinese: 不但可以紧拥入怀，还可以尽情亲吻。

sentences.english: It is not only loved by local people, but by international friends as well.
sentences.chinese: 它不但被当地人所喜爱，而且连国际友人也非常喜爱。

sentences.english: Indisputably, the application of open spandrel design makes the bridge more exquisite.
sentences.chinese: 确实，敲肩拱的应用，不但使桥形变得更加优美。

sentences.english: Mr. B will not only do something good for his school but likewise for his community.
sentences.chinese: 先生不但为他的学校，也为他的社区做好事。

sentences.english: He sits late at night as well as working hard during the day.
sentences.chinese: 他不但白天努力工作，夜里还常熬夜。

sentences.english: The Bell Tower in Xi'an was not only built earlier, but also taller than any other in the country.
sentences.chinese: 因而西安的钟楼不但修的早，而且也修得高大雄伟。

sentences.english: Not, the mice always make the house smelly and disgusting.
sentences.chinese: 不喜欢，老鼠不但很恶心，还会将房间弄得很臭。

sentences.english: Not only was she not angry; on the contrary she seemed very pleased.
sentences.chinese: 她不但没生气，相反，显得特别高兴。

sentences.english: A certain degree of speculation should not only be allowed but also necessary.
sentences.chinese: 一定程度的房地产投机不但应该允许，而且是必要的。

sentences.english: Not only beautiful image, also traction sculpture of love people dream of aestheticism.
sentences.chinese: 不但雕塑美的形象，还牵引人们对恋爱唯美的梦幻。

sentences.english: It moisturizes the skin and the elasticity gets better as well.
sentences.chinese: 它不但能滋润肌肤，更使肌肤变得有弹性。

sentences.english: Not only will it be very interesting and fun, it's also a way to improve understanding about eachother.
sentences.chinese: 不但会很有意思，很好玩，但是也会给两方带来了解。

definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
apart from this/in addition to this
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
